metadata.title: CVE-2020-15669 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When aborting an operation, such as a fetch, an abort signal may be deletedwhile alerting the objects to be notified. This results in a use-after-freeand we presume that with enough effort it could have been exploited to runarbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 68.12 andThunderbird < 68.12.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
